title: 为何闪退？
author: hgx100
txt_content:

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content:
customnpcs{1.7.10d} [CustomNpcs] ([樱之都]CustomNPCs_1.7.10d.jar) 
报错是找不到主类，尝试更新/更换稳定版，不行的话删除
